content: co1 tb ktb ktb m1l p to marker p1 p to the last 2 sts k1 m1r kbf 189 sts row 61 co15 tb ktbx16 k to marker m1r k1 m1l k to the last 2 sts k1 m1r kbf 208 sts row 62 co15 tb ktbx16 k to marker k1 k to the last 2 sts k1 m1r kbf 225 sts row 63 co1 tb ktb ktb m1l k to marker k1 k to the last 2 sts k1 m1r kbf 229 sts row 64 co1 tb ktb ktb m1l p to marker p1 p to the last 2 sts k1 m1r kbf 233 sts row 65 co17 tb ktbx18 k to marker k1 k to the last 2 sts k1 m1r kbf 252 sts row 66 co17 tb ktbx18 k to marker k1 k to the last 2 sts k1 m1r kbf 271 sts the lace pattern starts from this point from now on all increases are incorporated into the pattern notes and the centre stitch is shown in brackets i e k1 as you knit you will notice that the lace makes the top of the shawl undulate don t worry this should be blocked to create a straight edge when you block your shawl this is where the beads can be added if desired these stitches are highlighted yellow make the stitch place a bead on the crochet hook and place the new stitch in the curve of the hook pull the stitch through the bead placing the bead firmly at the bottom of the stitch and place the stitch back on the right hand needle and make sure the stitch is firm a useful place to look for clear instructions is http //fluffyknitterdeb blogspot com/2005/08/by-special-request-beading-made- easy html change to 5mm us8 needles row 67 ktb k2 yo k3 ssk k1 k2tog k3 yo k1 repeat until the marker and centre stitch m1r sm k1 sm m1l k1 yo k3 ssk k1 k2tog k3 yo repeat until three stitches remain k2 ktb 273 sts row 68 ktb k2 purl to last three stitches k2 ktb 273 sts row 69 ktb k2 yo k3 ssk k1 k2tog k3 yo k1 yo repeat until one stitch remains before the marker and centre stitch k1 sm k1 sm k1 yo k1 yo k3 ssk k1 k2tog k3 repeat until three stitches remain yo k2 ktb 275 sts row 70 ktb k2 purl to last three stitches k2 ktb 275 sts dragonfly wings v1 6 boo knits © 2011 further patterns available at www ravelry com/designers/boo-knits page 4 row 71 ktb k2 yo k4 s2kpsso k4 yo k1 yo repeat until two stitches before the marker and centre stitch k2 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k2 yo k1 yo k4 s2kpsso k4 repeat until three stitches remain yo k2 ktb 279 sts row 72 ktb k2 purl to last three stitches k2 ktb 279 sts row 73 ktb k2 yo k4 s2kpsso k4 yo k1 yo repeat until four stitches
